name: One Slot Knight Web
description:
All art and code made for GMTK 2019

PhysicalFiles: https://dedzix.itch.io/one-slot-knight

A game about a knight who lost all his inventory slots to a ripped bag. Now fighting his his way through the dungeon, only one item in hand at a time.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD: to move
  • 1,2,3: to pickup sword, bow,or shield (respectively)
  • Q: to drop held item (improves movement speed)
  • Left Click: to shoot bow
  • Mouse: to aim

CREDITS:

Programmer: Dedzix

Artist: JopJop

Cruising for Goblins Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
